Package com.glyart.mystral.datasource

Interface DataSourceFactory<T extends DataSource>

Type Parameters:
T - the DataSource type
All Known Implementing Classes:
HikariFactory
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface DataSourceFactory<T extends DataSource>
Convenient interface for lazily creating DataSource objects. This interface exposes the newDataSource() method, which inits the DataSource.

Knowing this, implementations must call newDataSource() when it's all set.

This interface can be used to create any datasource which supports a property-based configuration.

See Also:
DataSource, HikariFactory

  • Method Details

    • newDataSource

      @NotNull T newDataSource() throws DataSourceInitException
      If ready, a new DataSource is created with its configuration.
      Returns:
      the DataSource
      Throws:
      DataSourceInitException - if something went wrong.
      This method doesn't need to throw a SQLException.
      Further explanations can be found here.
